m: : And being in a dark Shibuya, where this... big thing finds me.
to remind him, he's here, it's okay.
: It... it tries to do cruel things to me.
: Like... looking like a friend, or like someone from my family.
: No matter what it does, or what it tries to look like, it always finds a way to kill me.
inhales slowly and leans into her hug-
keeps talking, a bit quieter;
: Every time I have that dream, I... I see that monster. But I...
: I see my dad there, too.
never remembers Koga ever mentioning his dad really
pulls away, just a bit, so he can look at the ground.
: I don't... he's not someone I want to think about, but...
: I think trying to forget about him's why I keep having these nightmares.
grimaces for a moment, but shakes his head.
: I never told you about him, huh?
: You don't have to if you feel it's too much.
: I think I need to talk about it.
squeezes her hand one more time and pulls his hand away, folding his together.
ignores the urge to hold both of his folded hands and lets him be
: ... Back... when we used to live away from Shibuya, Papa lived with us for a while.
: I really... really looked up to him.
brings a hand up to his hair, gently fussing with it as he goes on.
: ... He liked doing things that helped me get smarter. Be a better kid in school.
: It felt nice, doing things that made him proud.
: ...  As long as I was focusing on school and being at the top of my class, I was fine with him.
: He didn't like it when I wasn't doing much else.
: ... N. Not even if it was something like taking care of Taiki and Nori,
: Or finding things that wasn't going to help me keep my grades up.
thinks back to early Koga...so driven to stay in a room and read textbooks
: ... Or, doing... anything that won't... make me grow up faster.
kind of. stops fussing with his hair and clasps his hands together, tightly.
: He used-- he used to get really mad, if I wasn't doing too great.
: He never shouted or hurt me, but--
but keeps quiet, letting him go on
...gently reaches a hand to his shoulder, and squeezes it
to heck with letting him be, he needs comfort dammit
blinks-- and looks up to her.
puts a hand over hers and squeezes--
: ... He- he never hurt me, I swear. But...
thinking: but he clearly *did* hurt you
: One night, I heard him and Mama talking about... all the things that he was keeping from me and my brothers.
: Things about being in debt. Not living the way he and Mama planned.
: I didn't really get it. I still don't.
: But... the way he said it then, it sounded like a lot of it wasn't his fault. And it wasn't Mama's either.
: It wasn't any of yours, either.
attacked for 100. It did 3 damage instead!
slowly relaxes -- he's. he's gotten really tense since he started talking.
: I think... hearing him talk about that stuff's why I keep having nightmares.
: All've the stuff he was afraid of... they're the things I'm scared of now.
: ... Not being able to live up to peoples' expectations. Not being able to protect people.
adjusts herself so she is sitting more angled toward him, and takes both of his hands into hers
: For as long as I've known you, you've always worked past your limits. You've met and defied people's expectations. Exceeded them too.
: You're one of the most kind, compassionate, intelligent, and dedicated people I know.
: You were strong enough to defeat the UG, and you continue to get stronger every day. You are strong enough to withstand so much, and to do so much for others.
: And now, you are strong enough to face your fears and doubts. And you can overcome them, because you've done it before.
reaches one hand up to cup his cheek, and gently rubs her thumb across it
.. ..... kind of. wordlessly gapes for a moment, before closing his eyes.
trembles a bit before inhaling.
... a tear rolls down his cheek.
brushes it with her thumb
is. trying to talk, but can't.
look at where you are, look at where you started
I'm Already Dead I can't help you there--
if I could grant you peace of mind, if you could let me inside your heart- - M O OD AN YWAY
if he wasn't crying before, he is now..--
gently tbh everything she's doing rn is super gentle lol! leans in and gives him a soft kiss on the forehead
oh my poor s o u l
: me -- i n h a l e s -
chatzy you're the real MVP in this RP
-- gulps and. removes his glasses so he can wipe at an eye.
his thoughts keep circling back to that but.
meets his gaze, with love and support in her eyes
flipped Tails!
imagine if you will, sparkling anime expressive cerulean eyes
that's just-- adorable? What? Excuse me?
: -- I... I don't think. I'm ever going to be what he wants me to be.
: And... that's. That's a good thing. Right?
: I think the Kogasa that would have come out would still call Jean, Jean-sama.
slowly buries his face into his hands and groans quietly.
but then sobers into a softer smile
: I'm so happy you are who you are.
: And I know I'm not the only one.
Kogasa survived: Middle School Cringe!
inhales, and leans back against the bench.
How is this kid still alive I'm absolutely s o b b in g
starts humming a tune again--
: ... I think... I think that's for the best. Yeah.
moves a little bit so he can lean gently on her.
needs to choose between You Know the one, CCS, other disney or other in general. They chose: other in general!
oh darn you're no fun chatzy forget it
gently leans her head on his :'0! and tucks her arm through his as well
moves a hand so it covers one of hers, and closes his eyes.
flipped Tails!
flipped Heads!
starts humming this because she knows
do you want me to start crying all over again-
i a m sim pl y humming y our favorite so ng-
s n r k s - --
you can be mean sometimes??? you know that right--
yeah, you. Who would've thought h o n e s t l y --
well i need to see your evidence, counselor
what's literally happening right now??
:'T Well g e e z
you know I love you :'3
softly kisses him on the cheek!
is now a lovely shade of pink! thank you--
you're welcome! pink looks good on you
is a bit pink herself- heh
-- gently snorts and hides his face into her hair--
her hair is pouffy enough for him to hide well--
okay but!! so is yours???
-- goes from pink to tomato--
--especially when it's extra fluffy or when it's in that tiny ponytail sometimes--
with a free hand, she pulls from her static space a container of turtle shaped cookies
-- you actually want me to cry
: I- uhm. Made these the other day, with Nora's help-
puts a hand over his mouth and turns his face away, completely red up to his ears--
o h m y god-
WAY TO CAPTURE A MOOD
this' how he dies again--
is also blushing a fair amount, but lightly amused at his reaction
attacked for 100. It did 49 damage instead!
His soul's escaping his body in the best way js??
omg i can-- picture that--
also had been sorta growing flowers near their bench ;; lol
his soul's returned!! and he looks from the cookies, to Ama, and back again - very pink in the face!
the blush on her face increases a few notches as she nods-
takes a cookie and inspects it - his eyes are practically sparkling, omf-- before munching on it.
-- oh no he's so cute-
observes the flowers growing around them?
a mix of several ! Most prominently austrian rose and mullein, but there's also some french willow and a few small, white flowers
eyes go to the white ones, and he...
frowns and massages a temple.
as she's nibbling on a cookie of her own, glances at Kogasa
: ... I dunno. I feel like I've seen those somewhere.
nods over to the white flowers.
: Oh, the white ones? They're heathers.
: ... Maybe I saw them in a dream- nightmare. Something.
reaches for another cookie and looks at the other flowers.
: Ah, well there's austrian rose there, mullein, and french willow.
: The um, the first one means...um "Thou art all that is lovely..."
scratches at a cheek and hums-
: And then mullein is "health," and french willow is "bravery and humanity"
speeds through the last two lmao
always associates austrian rose with Kogasa- - hfeshdfhsdfsg
smiles back at him, heart swelling some
flipped Heads!
third time's the charm! and gives him a quick peck on the lips !
is also a tomato! you're welcome!!
laughs a little bit with him
:'D Y-- you're kind of ridiculous, you know that??
gives her a quick kiss as well, before going back to leaning on her.
-- You wanna do something before we head home tonight?
kind of doesn't want to go home just yet, ah ha;;
has had a thing in mind- -
what would you say to the aquarium--
I mean- - let's do it -
unseen motion blurring in place OH BOY OH MAN OH BOYAWMAN
motions to stand up-- though she hates leaving the nice cuddly position lol--
eye sparkles SO MUCH-- nods and follows her lead!
it's okay, they can do more've it after the aquarium/when the day's done. maybe-- :'D
holds his hand as she leads the way!
is-- looking so happy right now, wow. Wow? Wow??? W
wow! it's a christmas miracle
and so, the day is saved, thanks to the Powerpuff Girls-- and the kids go off and have a good time at the aquarium

Nori why are you so cute????
is sitting at her cafe, typing on her phone.
closes her phone, putting her hands together in prayer
places a hot cup of tea down for the praying woman.
: Na Mu Gui Yi Seng, Na Mu Gui San Hou
continues chanting like this for a while...
...stops eventually, prostrating herself before reaching for the tea
: I have a room upstairs, yes.
: I see. That makes a lot of sense. I was wondering why you were here so late by yourself.
: ...mm. I don't meditate out in the open.
: He and I shared mentors, but he was given my mentor's position instead.
: Because I failed to answer the first question.
: That sounds really troubling. You two didn't stop being friends because of it, did you?
: Not at all, not at all. We jive together, now and then.
: But I keep thinking of that question.
: I never found the answer, though. I thought coming to Shibuya would answer it, but it's made me more jaded than anything.
: Reminded me how lucky I was to find a mentor who was willing to let me have a chance. Wasn't until I became Buddhist that I really understood that.
looks at her for a moment...
: Why not pay your friend and mentor a visit?
: Mm. They'd be ashamed to see me now.
: Haven't done any work in the last year. I'd never stop hearing it from them.
: I would be very sad if I couldn't see my friend again because they were scared to see me.
: If I have to reprimand them, it'd be because I cared enough to want to help them.
: Don't think the Duke would want to see me like this. Doubt he'd even bother showing up.
: Take a vacation and find out for yourself.
: ...I'd like to have better insight first.
downs the tea all at once
Remember to drink water and stretch a little bit today! ヽ(ﾟ∀ﾟ )ﾉ
And... don't compare your hard-worked-for cupcake, to someone else's five-tiered birthday cake.
You're great at whatever you're doing. Don't give up hope...!

: He was... playing Reaper Creeper with Nori...?

: How is school? Doing well in your classes?

: Good! Well, I'm sure. I know you were telling me about your great tutor
: He's been such a great help.

blush increases, but her expression softens some
: You know, not too long ago was the anniversary of when I was made into a Reaper. Usually it gets me pretty down, and still thinking about it kinda does.
: Lots of good things have come out of it.
: I would have never made all the friends I have had I not been given this. Even if I didn't ask for it.
: It's weird how death does that huh?
: We get to be more alive in some ways because we know what it's like to not be.
: And we know how much time that people have so you have to make the most of it.
